Lion
Genre(s)
Heavy Metal
Origin 	Formed in 	Last label 	Status
United States of America (Los Angeles, CA) 	1985 	Grand Slamm Records 	Split-up
Last known line-up
Kal Swan - Vocals (Tytan, Guest for Minoru Niihara, Bad Moon Rising)
Jerry Best - Bass (Dio, Freak of Nature)
Doug Aldrich - Guitars (Burning Rain, Mansfield, Whitesnake, Bad Moon Rising, Hurricane, Minoru Niihara (Guest), Dio)
Mark Edwards - Drums (Steeler (US), 3rd Stage Alert, Burning Starr)
Former/past member(s)
Tony Smith - Guitar (Lone Star)
Kev &#039;Skidz&#039; Riddles - Keyboards (guest) (Tytan, ex-Angel Witch, ex-Samson (UK))
Alex Cambell - Bass (Hellion (US))
Additional notes
Lion are probably most famous for recording a Heavy Metal version of the theme from the cartoon "The Transformers" for the movie spin-off. It appears as a bonus track on the Dangerous Attraction album.

Dangerous Attraction 	Full-length, 1987
